name: I'm Having a Problem - Visual - Output

speech: Theres a couple things you can do in this case! |1. Check in you device settings that Teams has access to your camera, if Teams isn't allowed to use your camera then your camera can't be used to display anything |2. Check that nothing is blocking your camera |3. if your device has multiple camera inputs either change your default input through your computer settings or go the the little gear at the top of your meeting to change which input device it's using. Doesn't work? Try the Microsoft Teams Community Page! https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/msteams/forum?sort=LastReplyDate&dir=Desc&tab=All&status=all&mod=&modAge=&advFil=&postedAfter=&postedBefore=&threadType=All&isFilterExpanded=false&page=1
